## About me

I am interested in different topics of pure and applied mathematics, thereby touching the broad fields of analysis, ergodic theory and dynamical systems.

Most recently, I worked as a lecturer and research assistant at [HS Bremen](https://www.hs-bremen.de/en/).

Beforehand, I was a postdoctoral researcher at the [Institute for Analysis and Numerics](https://www.uni-muenster.de/AMM/en/) of the [University of Münster](https://www.uni-muenster.de/en/) supervised by [Prof. Dr. M. Pirner](https://www.uni-muenster.de/AMM/en/Pirner/index.shtml).

I obtained my PhD (Dr. rer. nat.) in Mathematics at the [University of Bremen](https://www.uni-bremen.de/en/) under the supervison of [Prof. Dr. J. Rademacher](https://www.math.uni-hamburg.de/en/forschung/bereiche/am/ang-dynamische-systeme/personen/rademacher-jens.html) and [Prof. Dr. M. Keßeböhmer](https://www.uni-bremen.de/dynsys/members/prof-dr-marc-kesseboehmer).

Moreover, I did some teaching at the [Jacobs University Bremen](https://constructor.university/).

*Further details can be found on the subpages above.*
